note: ☑️ I am the owner and general manager of Stage Presence, a theatrical services company. I have produced a number of cabarets in Danbury, CT. I was a technical director for years at the Danbury Shakespeare festival at Richter Park, and I am the co-founder of Musicals at Richter. My professional training was through the Performing Arts Management Institute of NYC. I have also worked marketing services for Proctor and Gamble, and was a project manager for iHeartMedia.
